metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart reacts to Viconia turning into a wolf during the combat.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the Sharran Grotto2. Bring Shadowheart3. Engage Viconia4. Get in combat5. Wait until Viconia turns into a wolf.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: I'm not afraid of wolves any more - spare me your cheap tricks!
0.context: NodeContext: Angry/in combat - Viconia has turned into a wolf to provoke Shadowheart's phobia, but knowing the truth (that a wolf she encountered as a child was her father) she is no longer afraid.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.context: NodeContext: Fearful/in combat. Reacting to viconia using her phobia of wolves against her by turning herself and her minions into them durinng combat.
